direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods manipulate the internal state of the ValidatorResults object, but in opposite ways (adding vs. clearing).
Both methods involve modifying the internal map of validation results, making test cases for one method applicable to the other.
The add method relies on getValidatorResult to retrieve existing results, indicating a strong dependency that can be tested together.
Both add methods handle the addition of validation results with similar control flows and parameter handling.
